00036 Halo::Halo(){
00037   //nothing to do
00038 }
00039 
00040 Halo::~Halo(){
00041   // nothing to do as well
00042 }
00043 
00044 Halo::Halo(Simulation sim, real* pos, real* vel, real* mass, int* type, unsigned npart){
00045   sim_ = sim;
00046   pos_ = pos;
00047   vel_ = vel;
00048   mass_ = mass;
00049   type_ = type;
00050   npart_ = npart;
00051 
00052   calcMtot();  // independent on centering
00053   centerCM();  // first centering on reference point, no bndry anymore
00054   centerVel(); // used for Ekin in
00055   centerMB();  // most bound gives one halo in a binary as the main ref.
00056   centerVel(); // necessary for J,Lambda'
00057   calcDvec();  // distances from CMB
00058   calcVir(sim_.getRhobox()); // rvir, mvir
00059 }

00063 /*
00064  * sum all particle masses
00065  */
00066 void
00067 Halo::calcMtot(){
00068   std::cout << " in calcMtot..." << std::endl;
00069   // sum over all particles inside halo
00070   mtot_ = 0.0;
00071   for(unsigned i = 0; i<npart_; ++i){
00072     mtot_ += mass_[i];
00073   }
00074 }
00075 
00076 /*
00077  * determine virial radius and mass
00078  * from spherical overdensity criterion
00079  * stopping at radius of first particle outside
00080  * required density
00081  * TODO: better approximation using ellipsoid,
00082  * or using all particles in overdensity, median value
00083  */
00084 void
00085 Halo::calcVir(real rhobox){
00086   std::cout << " in calcVir..." << std::endl;
00087   // using VirialProperties
00088   mvir_ = 0.0;
00089   rvir_ = 0.0;
00090 
00091   real OM = sim_.getOmegaM();
00092   real OL = sim_.getOmegaL();
00093   real a = sim_.getAsnap();
00094 
00095   real pi43 = 4.0 * M_PI / 3.0;
00096   real fz =  OM / ( a*a*a ) / (OM/( std::pow(a,3))+ OL ) - 1.0;
00097 
00098   real rhocrit = rhobox / OM * std::pow(a,3);
00099   // mean density / critical density (e.g. Bryan, Norman 1998)
00100   real delta = ( 18.0 * PI * PI + 82.0 * fz - 39.0 * fz * fz );
00101 
00102   // for density delta following Bryan, Norman 1998
00103   real rhodelta = delta * rhocrit;
00104   // for simple 200* overdensity criterion
00105   //real rhodelta = 200.0 * rhobox;
00106 
00107   real Vc;
00108   real Vcmax = -1.0e+99;
00109 
00110   real minside = 0.0;
00111   real R = 0.0;
00112   real rhomean = 1.0e+99;
00113 
00114   std::cout << "dvec_ has size: " << dvec_.size() << std::endl;
00115   std::cout << "asnap is: " << sim_.getAsnap() << std::endl;
00116   for( unsigned ninside=0;
00117        rhomean > rhodelta && ninside < npart_;
00118        ++ninside) {
00119     //    if(ninside % 1000 == 10){
00120     //  std::cout << ninside << "/" << npart_ << ":" << rhodelta << " " << rhomean << std::endl;
00121     //std::cout << minside << std::endl;
00122     //}
00123     R = sim_.getAsnap() * dvec_[ninside].getr();
00124     minside += mass_[dvec_[ninside].geti()];
00125 
00126     rhomean = minside / ( pi43 * std::pow(R,3) );
00127 
00128     Vc = minside / R;
00129     if ( Vc > Vcmax )
00130       Vcmax = Vc;
00131   }
00132 
00133   Vcmax = Vcmax * sim_.getG();
00134   mvir_ = minside;
00135   rvir_ = R;
00136   //rvir_ = sim_.getAsnap()*dvec_[npart_-1].getr();
00137 
00138 }
00139 
00140 /*
00141  * given a coordinate xc
00142  * subtract it from all particle positions,
00143  * correcting for periodic boundaries
00144  */
00145 void 
00146 Halo::centerOnCoord( Vector3 xc ){
00147   std::cout << " in centerOnCoord..." << std::endl;
00148   //real boxlength = sim_.getBoxlength();
00149   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00150     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00151       pos_[3*i+j] = pos_[3*i+j] - xc(j);//TODO: bndry conditions
00152     }
00153   }
00154 }
00155 
00156 /*
00157  * calculate center of mass (also for halos across boundary)
00158  * and subtract it from all positions of particles in halo
00159  */
00160 void
00161 Halo::centerCM(){
00162   std::cout << " in centerCM..." << std::endl;
00163   xcm_ = 0.0;
00164 
00165   Vector3 rfirst;
00166 
00167   real boxlength = sim_.getBoxlength();
00168   real hBL = boxlength / 2.0;
00169   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00170     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00171       real dr = pos_[3*i+j] - rfirst(j);
00172       if ( dr >= hBL ) {
00173     dr -= boxlength;
00174       } else if ( dr < -hBL ) {
00175     dr += boxlength;
00176       }
00177       xcm_(j) += dr * mass_[i];
00178     }
00179   }
00180   xcm_ = xcm_ / mtot_ + rfirst;
00181 
00182   centerOnCoord( xcm_ );
00183 }
00184 
00191 void
00192 Halo::centerMB(){
00193   std::cout << " in centerMB..." << std::endl;
00194   std::vector<real> kin;
00195   std::vector<real> pot;
00196   real totkin = 0.0;
00197   real totpot = 0.0;
00198 
00199   totkin = calcEkinNoHubble( kin );
00200   if ( npart_ > FORCE_DIRECT_TREE_SPLIT ) {
00201     totpot = calcPotTree( 0.75, 0.001, pot );
00202   } else {
00203     totpot = calcPotDirect( 0.001, pot );
00204   }
00205 
00206   real Emin = 1.0e+99;
00207   unsigned imb = 0;
00208 
00209   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00210     real Eres = kin[i] + pot[i];
00211     if ( Eres < Emin ) {
00212       Emin = Eres;
00213       imb = i;
00214     }
00215   }
00216   xmb_ = Vector3(pos_[3*imb+0], pos_[3*imb+1], pos_[3*imb+2]);
00217   centerOnCoord( xmb_ );
00218   xmb_ += xcm_;
00219   vmb_ = Vector3(vel_[3*imb],vel_[3*imb+1],vel_[3*imb+2]);
00220 }
00221 
00222 
00229 void
00230 Halo::centerVel(){
00231   std::cout << " in centerVel..." << std::endl;
00232   // set vcm to 0.0
00233   vcm_ = 0.0;
00234     
00235   // add up velocities with weight given by mass
00236   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00237     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00238       vcm_(j) += vel_[3*i+j] * mass_[i];
00239     }
00240   }
00241 
00242   // normalize velocity and subtract it from all other velocities
00243   assert( mtot_ > 0.0 );
00244   vcm_ /= mtot_;
00245   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ){
00246     for(unsigned j=0; j<3; ++j){
00247       vel_[3*i+j] -= vcm_( j );
00248     }
00249   }
00250 }
00251 
00258 void 
00259 Halo::calcDvec() {
00260   std::cout << " in calcDvec..." << std::endl;
00261   //dvec_.clear();
00262 
00263   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i) {
00264     real ds2 = 0.0;
00265     for ( int j = 0; j < 3 ;++j )
00266       ds2 += pos_[3*i+j] * pos_[3*i+j];
00267     dvec_.push_back( Distance( std::sqrt( ds2 ), i ) );
00268   }
00269 
00270   rtot_ = dvec_.back().getr();
00271   std::sort( dvec_.begin(), dvec_.end() );
00272   //  for(unsigned i = 0; i<100 && i<npart_; ++i)
00273   //  std::cout << dvec_[i].getr() << ",";
00274   std::cout << std::endl;
00275 }

00324 bool
00325 Halo::consider(int ptype, int htype){
00326   switch(htype){
00327   case 15:
00328     return true;
00329   case 3:
00330     if(ptype==1 || ptype==2 || ptype==3 || ptype == 5){
00331       return true;
00332     }else {
00333       return false;
00334     }
00335   case 4:
00336     if(ptype == 0){
00337       return true;
00338     }else{
00339       return false;
00340     }
00341   case 8:
00342     if(ptype == 4){
00343       return true;
00344     }else{
00345       return false;
00346     }
00347   case 12:
00348     if(ptype==0 || ptype==4){
00349       return true;
00350     }else{
00351       return false;
00352     }
00353   default:
00354     return false;
00355   } 
00356 }

00359 
00366 real 
00367 Halo::calcEkin( std::vector<real>& kin ) {
00368   std::cout << " in calcEkin..." << std::endl;
00369   real kintot = 0.0;
00370   kin.clear();
00371 
00372   Vector3 v;
00373   real asnap = sim_.getAsnap();
00374   real sqrta = std::sqrt( asnap );
00375   real Hza = sim_.getH0() * asnap 
00376     * std::sqrt( sim_.getOmegaM()/std::pow( asnap,3 ) + sim_.getOmegaL() );
00377 
00378   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00379     v = 0.0;
00380     real k = 0;
00381     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00382       v(j) = sqrta * vel_[3*i+j] + Hza * pos_[3*i+j];
00383     }
00384     k = 0.5 * mass_[i] * v.norm2();
00385     
00386     kin.push_back( ( real ) k );
00387     kintot += k;
00388   }
00389 
00390   return kintot;
00391 }
00392 
00399 real 
00400 Halo::calcEkinNoHubble( std::vector<real>& kin ) {
00401   std::cout << " in calcEkinNoHubble..." << std::endl;
00402   real kintot = 0.0;
00403   kin.clear();
00404 
00405   Vector3 v;
00406   real sqrta = std::sqrt( sim_.getAsnap() );
00407   
00408   // need for memory
00409   kin.reserve(npart_);
00410   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00411     v = 0.0;
00412     real k = 0;
00413     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00414       v(j) = sqrta * vel_[3*i+j];
00415     }
00416     
00417     k = 0.5 * mass_[i] * v.norm2();
00418     
00419     kin.push_back( real(k) );
00420     kintot += k;
00421   }
00422   return kintot;
00423 }
00424 
00431 real
00432 Halo::calcPotDirect( real plumsoft, std::vector<real>& phi ) {
00433   std::cout << " in calcPotDirect..." << std::endl;
00434   real phitot = 0.0;
00435   real asnap = sim_.getAsnap();
00436 
00437   plumsoft *= asnap;
00438   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00439     real phii = 0.0;
00440     for ( unsigned j = i + 1; j < npart_; ++j ) {
00441       real
00442     dx = asnap * ( pos_[3*i+0] - pos_[3*j+0] ),
00443     dy = asnap * ( pos_[3*i+1] - pos_[3*j+1] ),
00444     dz = asnap * ( pos_[3*i+2] - pos_[3*j+2] );
00445 
00446       real r2 = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
00447       if ( j != i )
00448     phii += -sim_.getG()*mass_[i]*mass_[i]/( std::sqrt( r2 )+plumsoft );
00449     }
00450 
00451     phi.push_back( phii );
00452     phitot += phii;
00453   }
00454   return phitot;
00455 }
00456 
00457 /*
00458  * \brief calculate potential using a OctTree
00459  * with opening angle theta
00460  * \param real theta: opening angle; determining when new leave is added
00461  * \param real plumsoft:
00462  * \param std::vector<real>& phi: potential getting output
00463  * \returns total potential NRJ
00464  */
00465 real
00466 Halo::calcPotTree( real theta, real plumsoft, std::vector<real>& phi ) {
00467   std::cout << " in calcPotTree..." << std::endl;
00468   real phitot = 0.0;
00469   phi.clear();
00470   real asnap = sim_.getAsnap();
00471   plumsoft *= asnap;
00472 
00473   std::vector< PseudoBody > barray;
00474 
00475   real xmin = 1.0e+99; //real xmax = -1.0e+99;
00476   real ymin = 1.0e+99; //real ymax = -1.0e+99;
00477   real zmin = 1.0e+99; //real zmax = -1.0e+99;
00478 
00479   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00480     xmin = ( pos_[3*i+0] < xmin ) ? pos_[3*i+0] : xmin;
00481     //xmax = ( pos_[3*i+0] > xmax ) ? pos_[3*i+0] : xmax;
00482     ymin = ( pos_[3*i+1] < ymin ) ? pos_[3*i+1] : ymin;
00483     //ymax = ( pos_[3*i+1] > ymax ) ? pos_[3*i+1] : ymax;
00484     zmin = ( pos_[3*i+2] < zmin ) ? pos_[3*i+2] : zmin;
00485     //zmax = ( pos_[3*i+2] > zmax ) ? pos_[3*i+2] : zmax;
00486   }
00487 
00488   real x, y, z;
00489   for ( unsigned i = 0, i3 = 0; i < npart_; ++i, i3 = 3 * i ) {
00490     x = asnap * ( pos_[3*i+0] - xmin );
00491     y = asnap * ( pos_[3*i+1] - ymin );
00492     z = asnap * ( pos_[3*i+2] - zmin );
00493 
00494     barray.push_back( PseudoBody( mass_[i], x, y, z ) );
00495   }
00496 
00497   //real length = std::max( std::max(xmax-xmin,ymax-ymin),zmax-zmin );
00498 
00499   //#ifndef OCTTREE
00500   //    kDTreeNode *BHroot = new kDTreeNode( barray );
00501   //#else
00502   OctTreeNode *BHroot = new OctTreeNode( barray, plumsoft ); //, length );
00503   //#endif
00504 
00505   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00506     real phii = sim_.getG()*mass_[i] * BHroot->traverse( barray[i].getx(),
00507                              barray[i].gety(),
00508                              barray[i].getz(),
00509                              theta, plumsoft );
00510     phitot += phii;
00511     phi.push_back( real( phii ) );
00512   }
00513 
00514   delete BHroot;
00515 
00516   return 0.5*phitot;
00517 }

00525 int
00526 Halo::calcNpart(int htype){
00527   int count=0;
00528   for(unsigned i=0; i<npart_; ++i){
00529     if(consider(type_[i],htype)){
00530     ++count;
00531     }
00532   }
00533   return count;
00534 }
00535 
00541 real
00542 Halo::calcMpart(int htype){
00543   real ms=0;
00544   for(unsigned i=0; i<npart_; ++i){
00545     if(consider(type_[i],htype)){
00546     ms+=mass_[i];
00547     }
00548   }
00549   return ms;
00550 }

00552 
00559 real
00560 Halo::calcSigma(int htype){
00561   //std::cout << " in calcSigma..." << std::endl;
00562   real sigma = 0.0;
00563   // either go on with norm of velocity vector
00564   // use method minimizing roundoff errors
00565   real a = 0.0, aold = 0.0;
00566   real q = 0.0, qold = 0.0;
00567   unsigned count = 0;
00568   for(unsigned i = 0; i<npart_; ++i){
00569     if(!consider(type_[i],htype))
00570       continue;
00571     ++count;
00572 
00573     real vx = vel_[3*i+0];
00574     real vy = vel_[3*i+1];
00575     real vz = vel_[3*i+2];
00576     real v2 = std::sqrt(vx*vx + vy*vy + vz*vz);
00577 
00578     //a_0 = 0
00579     //a_i = a_{i-1}+(x_i-a_{i-1})/i
00580     a = aold + (v2-aold)/(i+1);
00581     //q_0 = 0
00582     //q_i = q_{i-1}+(x_i-a_{i-1})(x_i-a_i)
00583     q = qold + (v2 - aold)*(v2 - a);
00584     
00585     aold = a;
00586     qold = q;
00587   }
00588 
00589   if(count == 0){
00590     sigma = 0.0;
00591   } else {
00592     sigma = std::sqrt(q/count);
00593   }
00594 
00595   // or step through all euclidean components
00596   // or through (r,phi,theta) components
00597   // or use other definition of sigma
00598   return sigma;
00599 }
00600 
00608 real
00609 Halo::calcLambda(int htype){
00610   //std::cout << " in calcLambda..." << std::endl;
00611   real lambda = -1.0;
00612 
00613   Vector3 J = 0.0;
00614   Vector3 d = 0.0;
00615   Vector3 v = 0.0;
00616   real minside = 0.0;
00617   real asnap = sim_.getAsnap();
00618   real sqrta = std::sqrt( asnap );
00619 
00620   unsigned count = 0;//count valid particles
00621 
00622   for( unsigned ninside=0; ninside < npart_;
00623 #warning Not using virial radius for calcLambda
00624     //&& sim_.getAsnap() * dvec[ninside].getr() < rvir_) {
00625        ++ninside ){
00626     if(!consider(type_[ninside],htype)){
00627       continue;
00628     }
00629     ++count;
00630     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00631       v(j) = sqrta * vel_[3*dvec_[ninside].geti()+j];
00632       d(j) = asnap * pos_[3*dvec_[ninside].geti()+j];
00633     }
00634     minside += mass_[dvec_[ninside].geti()];
00635     J += (d^v)*mass_[dvec_[ninside].geti()]; // d^v is cross product
00636   }
00637 
00638   if( count == 0 ){
00639     std::cerr << "No particles in halo" << std::endl;
00640     lambda = -1.0;
00641   } else {
00642   assert( mvir_ > 0.0 );
00643   assert( rvir_ > 0.0 );
00644   lambda = real( J.norm() 
00645          / ( std::sqrt( 2.0*sim_.getG()*rvir_*mvir_ ) 
00646              * minside ) );
00647   }
00648   return lambda;
00649 }
00650 
00651 
00658 Vector3 
00659 Halo::calcJ(int htype){
00660   //std::cout << " in calcJ..." << std::endl;
00661   Vector3 J = 0.0;
00662 
00663   Vector3 r,v;
00664   unsigned counter = 0;
00665   real asnap = sim_.getAsnap();
00666   // real Hza = sim_.getH0() * asnap * sqrt( sim_.getOmegaM() / ( asnap * asnap * asnap ) + sim_.getOmegaL() );
00667   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i ) {
00668     if(!consider(type_[i],htype )){
00669       continue;
00670     }
00671     counter++;
00672     for ( unsigned j = 0; j < 3; ++j ) {
00673       v(j) = std::sqrt(asnap)*vel_[3*i+j];//+Hza*pos_[3*i+j]; //HubbleFlow
00674       r(j) = asnap * pos_[3*i+j];
00675     }
00676     J += (r^v)*mass_[i];
00677   }
00678   //Jtot = sqrt( J( 0 ) * J( 0 ) + J( 1 ) * J( 1 ) + J( 2 ) * J( 2 ) );
00679   return J;
00680 }

00683 
00684 
00691 Eigensystem3
00692 Halo::calcShape(int htype){
00693   //std::cout << " in calcShape..." << std::endl;
00694   int count = 0;
00695   Matrix33 I; I = 0.0;
00696   for ( unsigned i = 0; i < npart_; ++i) {
00697     if(!consider(type_[i],htype)){
00698       continue;
00699     }
00700     count++;
00701     I(0,0)+= mass_[i]*( pos_[3*i+1]*pos_[3*i+1] + pos_[3*i+2]*pos_[3*i+2]);
00702     I(0,1)+= mass_[i]*(-pos_[3*i+0]*pos_[3*i+1]);
00703     I(0,2)+= mass_[i]*(-pos_[3*i+0]*pos_[3*i+2]);
00704 
00705     I(1,0)+= mass_[i]*(-pos_[3*i+1]*pos_[3*i+0]);
00706     I(1,1)+= mass_[i]*( pos_[3*i+0]*pos_[3*i+0] + pos_[3*i+2]*pos_[3*i+2]);
00707     I(1,2)+= mass_[i]*(-pos_[3*i+1]*pos_[3*i+2]);
00708 
00709     I(2,0)+= mass_[i]*(-pos_[3*i+2]*pos_[3*i+0]);
00710     I(2,1)+= mass_[i]*(-pos_[3*i+2]*pos_[3*i+1]);
00711     I(2,2)+= mass_[i]*( pos_[3*i+0]*pos_[3*i+0] + pos_[3*i+1]*pos_[3*i+1]);
00712   }
00713   if(count==0){
00714     std::cerr << "No particles for calculation of Eigensystem" << std::endl;
00715     I.set_diag(Vector3(-1,-1,-1)/0.0);
00716   }
00717   Eigensystem3 E = Eigensystem3(I);
00718   E.calcEV();
00719   assert(mtot_>0.0);
00720   E.normalize(std::sqrt(5.0/(2.0*mtot_)));
00721 
00722   return E;
00723 }
